channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 07:54 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 07:54 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
